summary: Removes the female Glass Armor glitch in first-person view.
descriptionHtml:
Notice:  This is for females, only.  Males don\'t have this clipping issue.

I couldn\'t find a fix to this anywhere and decided to do something about it.  All this does is replace the 1st-person view .nif files of Glass armor, with the .nif files of Hide armor.  While this is mostly a \"quick\" fix, until someone actually modifies the Glass armor .nifs so they display properly, it still looks great.   Look at the images to see the difference!  :)

This should work with all Glass armor mods.  I checked out most of them and they don\'t modify 1st-person view .nif files.
author: IcePenguin
